Package org.texttechnologylab.duui.api.storage

Class MongoDBFilters

java.lang.Object
org.texttechnologylab.duui.api.storage.MongoDBFilters
public class MongoDBFilters extends Object
A convenience class that groups common filters applied to collections including limit, skip, sort, order, search, and comparison filters into a single object for easy access.
